config.VanillaMarnieStock.name: Vanilla Marnie Stock
config.VanillaMarnieStock.tooltip: Do not override Marnie's vanilla stock or shop menu, allowing Marnie to sell all animals.
config.VanillaLivestockMenu.name: Vanilla Livestock Menu
